name: Sonrisa's Butter Tart Squares
author: Sonrisa
summary: You'll never have to fuss with pastry again! These are just as delicious and half the fuss!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Whisk 1 cup flour and white sugar together in a bowl; cut 1/2 cup cold butter into flour mixture with a pastry blender until crumbly
Press flour mixture evenly into the bottom of a 9-inch square cake pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Remove to cool slightly, leaving oven on
Whisk eggs and 2 tablespoons melted butter together in a bowl; whisk in brown sugar, 2 tablespoons flour, baking powder, and vanilla extract
Stir raisins and pecans into egg mixture; pour over the base
Bake in the preheated oven until top springs back when touched, about 20 minutes
Cool completely before cutting into squares
